data.eml:eml: A new species of Apocellus Erichson, 1839 (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae) from Argentina with ecological notes

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chani-Posse, Mariana, Scheibler, Erica E. (2013): A new species of Apocellus Erichson, 1839 (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae) from Argentina with ecological notes. Zootaxa 3721 (2): 193-200, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3721.2.6
